FuncDef: The display diffserv domain application command displays the interface list applied to a DS domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a DS domain. The name of a DS domain can be default. It can also be defined by users. This parameter is defined using the diffserv domain command.
The value is a string of 1 to 48 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A DS domain can apply to multiple interfaces on a device. To query the list of interfaces applied to a DS domain, run the display diffserv domain application command.
